title: How to update Firefox in an environment with no Internet connection
content: Is there a way to update Firefox to the latest version when I am not connected to the Internet?
creator: Adyotch

title: Browser problem
content: Often with the BBC website I get error 410 gone. This usually but not exclusively happens when I click a link on a news or sport page. I do not get the error if I try the same action in the Edge browser. This happens with or without my VPN connected. It would seem that other users have this problem but I cannot find a solution.
creator: colinblakeburn

title: Websites Not Using Default System Theme
content:
I changed the systme theme in windows 10 to dark, websites still show up in white theme. Most websites that support dark mode will by default use the system theme, in my case dark.. So why isn't it working? For example i use the brave search engine search.brave.com, when i klick the settings icon it shows that by default it uses the system theme, as i said my system theme is dark but then why bravesearch using the white theme? It's not only bravesearch, same with duckduckgo search and same with youtube, all of them use the system theme, but for whatever reason everything is displayed in white theme instead of dark.

So i changed this setting in about:config but no matter which value i use (1,2,3) websites will always use system default - white theme, but infact my system theme is dark, how can i fix this? defaultPref("browser.theme.content-theme", 2);
creator: Firefox_Beginner

title: Firefox - Autocompilamento dati in un campo errato.
content: Aprendo un determinato forum c'è un box ove è possibile cercare gli utenti per nickname, dopo aver fatto accesso con le mie credenziali, ogni volta in questo box di ricerca compare sempre il mio indirozzo email. L'autocompilazione mi inserisce in automatico questo valore, ma non è un box di login e sinceramente mi dà fastidio vedere il mio indirizzo email lì presente, anche perchè ogni volta devo cancellare per poter scrivere eventuali nickname. Come posso risolvere questo problema di autocompilamento in un campo errato?
creator: Aviators

title: error message
content:
Access Denied You don't have permission to access "http://www.very.co.uk/account/myaccount/accountSummary.page?" on this server.

i keep getting this message up, ive deleted cookies and cache and even uninstalled firefox and reinstalled it

title: using image in chrome folder
content:
I downloaded an image file .png and put it in Firefox profile chrome folder and named it close-icon. The purpose is to replace the tab close button - now , to do so is this code right :

  1. tabbrowser-tabs .tab-stack .close-icon {

background-image: url(close-icon.png) !important; } Thanks look4

title: Firefox se nespustí
content:
Po stažení instalátoru a instalace dle standartních kroků firefox nelze spustit. Pouze problikne prázdné okno.

Používám Windows 10 bez dodatečných bezpečnostních systémů, nezobrazuje se mi žádný error nebo crash report. Zkusil jsem otevření v safe mode, reinstalaci, stažení 64-bitové i 32-bitové verze, restart zařízení a kombinace všech předchozích.

Předem děkuji za odpovědi!
creator: vojta003

title: Funzione "Opzioni"manca da "menu applicazione"
content: Pc portatile HP con Sistema Operativo Windows 10. Firefox installato da 2 anni, che si aggiorna automaticamente. Da menu Applicazione manca “Opzioni”. Ho eseguito senza successo le procedure indicate su sito ufficiale Support Mozilla. Ossia: 1. Riavvio in modalità Risoluzione dei problemi. 2. Ripristino di Firefox Ho pensato di disinstallare e poi reinstallare Firefox ma non vorrei perdere i preferiti e segnalibri che ho organizzato in cartelle. Ho cercato in rete altre soluzioni ma non trovato niente. Sapete aiutarmi per favore? “Opzioni”mi serve assolutamente per installare un programma di lavoro. Ps : non so sia utile come indicazione, ma anche su altri browser (es Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge), manca analoga funzione “Opzioni”o”Preferenze”. Grazie mille.
creator: anneka24

title: Crash at startup
content: Firefox 105.0.3 crashes at startup on Windows 11 Family 21H2 (build 22000.978) French. Location: France. No error message. Firefox main windows appears for a tenth of a second and disappears. Same in troubleshoot mode (Shift+firefox.exe). The troubleshoot dialog box shows for a tenth of a second and disappears. No error message. No crash report generated. Device is an MSI GF62 Thin. Antivirus is Microsoft's Essential Suite. No Norton, Avast, AVG, Malwarebytes or any other security software is installed (checked in task explorer and on the disk). I got this on another old PackardBell laptop (Windows 10) with the same security configuration. Cannot figure out what the problem is. I have no clue whatsoever. Any idea?
creator: morgangamergeek

title: unauthorized use of email or log in
content: I received notification that my email is being used to create account with mozilla firefox, thus how can I log out everywhere or from any device my email ?

title: Lišta záložek
content:
Dobrý den,

přestala se mi zobrazovat lišta záložek. Mám ji zaškrtnutou, aby se zobrazovala stále, ale nefunguje to. Z ničehonic se ztratila, a to jak na PC, tak na notebooku. Pracuju se záložkami neustále, potřebuju je mít stále "po ruce". Jak to udělat? Děkuji.
creator: ak.janousek

title: SALVATAGGIO NON RICHIESTO part.2
content: Download automatico anche se voglio semplicemente aprire un file, ad esempio word o pdf. Ho seguito la soluzione proposta in un thread di qualche mese fa, che adesso è chiuso, https://support.mozilla.org/it/questions/1370391 ma a me non cambia nulla
creator: ghibli1969

title: Firefox no me pide la contraseña maestra
content: Tengo activada la contraseña maestra, sin embargo, inicio Firefox y mi email sin que me la solicita. Sólo me la pide cuando quiero acceder a la configuración de las contraseñas. Quiero evitar que alguien que no sea yo pueda abrir mi email.
creator: siestaeslamia

title: Auto-fill forms that are saved via jquery.ajax
content: This might more be a feature suggestion, as I cannot find any way to make Firefox remember a form saved via jquery.ajax()? One-page-sites save data via ajax, which seems to skip the auto-fill save in Firefox. Even though the form is saved as Post with the javascript "new FormData()" in the data attribute. Perhaps a right-click on a input element could present a "save form to auto-fill" in the context menu?
creator: tro716

title: Firefox uses too much RAM
content: Hello there, Me and my co-workers are having trouble with Firefox RAM usage. After last update on every PC Firefox started to use too much RAM. Everyone has 8GB RAM and at least Intel Core i4 9th gen. What can we do to optimize Firefox? Is there any settings that will help with performence?

title: Firefox does not remove Tracking Cookies
content: Firefox does NOT deleted Tracking Cookies upon close even though that option is selected. Please see attached Screen Shots illusgtrating one example where 45 Tracking Cookies remained.
creator: eb47

title: Firefox 105.0.3-1 Broken Video Playback on Linux
content:
I installed this version of Firefox from the repository and I can no longer play back video. I have done a number of things to try to get the video playback to work again, however the bug persists. What I've done:

  • Reset Firefox
  • Disabled Hardware Acceleration
  • Disabled Any and ALL Plug-Ins
  • Uninstalled and Re-Installed the Browser
  • Switched between kernels
  • Ensured that Pipewire is functioning properly
  • Ensured that my hardware is functioning properly

I've done some other smaller things in my system to try to get this back, but as it appears, this bug still persists even after a delay in dropping the new version.
creator: sfacemire40

title: Mozilla Firefox failing as a browser on many levels. I find myself having to switch to safari or chrome to complete transactions.
content:
bold textMozilla Firefox failing as a browser on many levels. It's been my default browser for years. I am now having to switch to safari or chrome to complete transactions & for basic utilization of websites where there was not a problem before.

Firefox 105.0.3 MacOs Monterey Version 12.6
creator: josleed

title: Printing pages from the Bendigo Bank home banking is not working properly since last week
content: At work I always log on to the Bendigo Bank to look at transactions on our bank account. I need to print them off once a week. Since last week the pages don't print properly. Instead of showing the entire transactions, they are now half covered because the left hand side of the print page is covered by the bank's menu which always shows at the side of the webpage. I contacted the bank who said they'd had other firefox users complaining about this. They said that it's firefox's fault and follows an update which was done. Please can you help? I have attached a snipping tool image of the problem.

title: Incompatibility
content:
Macquarie Bank says its website is incompatible with Firefox and that I must change my browser to Google Chrome.

When I try to log on it often returns "An error has occurred. Oops, something went wrong. "

Their help desk advise that I can try cleaning up my junk files to make it work, but the fix is temporary. This log-on failure can happen several times a day, so that is not a workable option.

Perhaps it would be easier to change my bank!

Any suggestions?
creator: lynne14

title: you stopped me from playing with Crystal island on my Facebook account
content:
Did Not Connect: Potential Security Issue

Firefox detected an issue and did not continue to int01crystal.qublixgames.com. The website is either misconfigured or your computer clock is set to the wrong time.

It’s likely the website’s certificate is expired, which prevents Firefox from connecting securely. If you visit this site, attackers could try to steal information like your passwords, emails, or credit card details.

What can you do about it?

The issue is most likely with the website, and there is nothing you can do to resolve it. You can notify the website’s administrator about the problem.

Learn more…
